item.title: GitHub Webhooks With Azure Functions
item.description: Recently I wanted to build a GitHub webhook using C# Azure Functions, but could only find an example template using Node.js. Here, I set out to create a webhook to check the overall status of a build. The full code here is available here: GitHub Webhook Playground Check Suites Looking at the available webhook events there wasn’t an obvious event I could subscribe to get what I wanted. Currently, there isn’t an OTB event for when workflows complete.
